title: Feminist Movie Friday: Scream
itunes:title: Feminist Movie Friday: Scream
description:
We all scream for Scream - the original and the 2022 requel. Anney and Samantha lay down the rules and talk feminism, final girls,  the horror movie-metaverse, mothers, and toxic fandom. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
